Vandalism and Inappropriate Behavior Descriptions

A location was vandalized with swastikas and hate messages.
A group of teenagers laughed at and ridiculed a group of people described as chumps and dwarves.
A woman on a public bench is snorting cocaine while looking at her phone.
A baby girl sitting at a white table with a plate of food experiences theft of her meal by an unknown person.
A man is making donuts while wearing a hat and urinating on the street.
